// Pivot 0, 0
int FlipperR2[18] = {
	34, 1,
	39, 4,
	39, 11,
	35, 14,
	29, 14,
	4, 11,
	1, 9,
	1, 5,
	4, 2
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float FlipperR2[18] = {
	0.850000f, 0.066667f,
	0.975000f, 0.266667f,
	0.975000f, 0.733333f,
	0.875000f, 0.933333f,
	0.725000f, 0.933333f,
	0.100000f, 0.733333f,
	0.025000f, 0.600000f,
	0.025000f, 0.333333f,
	0.100000f, 0.133333f
};
